description:
#Northern Mariana Islands Population Grid 2020
Data Input: 
HH locations from Broadband Survey 2014 conducted PAPI and GPS. 
Population at village level extracted from 2010 Census
Year Population Growth Rate of 0.51% has been applied to update population up to 2020
HH locations vector layer with population estimates calculated from 2010 Census transformed into a 100m resolution raster.
name: Northern_Mariana_Islands_Population_Grid_2020
